name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題: 語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
schedule:
Week　　Date　　Topic
1　　9/14　　Course introduction
2　　9/21　　Learning a first language (Lightbrown 1)
3　　9/28　　Theoretical approaches to explaining second language learning (Lightbrown 2)
4　　10/5　　Interlanguage and the ‘natural’ route of development (Ellis 3)
5　　10/12　　Variability in interlanguage (Ellis 4)
6　　10/19　　Social aspects of interlanguage (Ellis 6)
7　　10/26　　Topic reflection presentation I
8　　11/2　　Discourse aspects of interlanguage
9　　11/9　　Topic reflection presentation II
10　　11/16　　Psycholinguistic aspects of interlanguage
11　　11/23　　Topic reflection presentation III
12　　11/30　　Learner strategies (Ellis 7)
13　　12/7　　Cross-linguistic influence and learner language (Brown 8)
14　　12/14　　Individual learner differences and L2acquisition (Ellis 8)
15　　12/21　　Communicative competence (Brown 9)
16　　12/28　　The role of formal instruction in L2 acquisition (Ellis 9)
17　　1/4　　Case study presentation I
18　　1/11　　Case study presentation II
scorePolicy: Attendance & Active Participation (15%); Topic Reflections (20%); Topic Reflection Presentation (15%); Topic Presentation (20%); Case Study & Presentation (30%).
materials:
Brown, H. Douglas, & Gonzo, Susan. (1995). Readings on second language acquisition. Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall Regents.
Ellis, Rod. (1989). Understanding second language acquisition. New York, NY: Oxford University Press.
Lightbrown, Patsy M., & Spada, Nina. (1999). How language are learned. New York, NY: Oxford University Press.
